mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(jydate, '%Y-%m-%d') jydate,entries FROM analysis WHERE sysaplatn = #{sysaplatn} AND jydate >= #{fxbgtm} and jydate <= #{fxedtm}

select MAX(entries) entries,DATE_FORMAT(jydate, '%Y-%m-%d') jydate FROM analysis WHERE sysaplatn = #{sysaplatn} AND jydate >= #{fxbgtm} and jydate <= #{fxedtm} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(jydate, '%Y-%m-%d')
